mapper.select: select * from t_vaccination where vacc_type = '심장사상충' and cat_seq = #{cat_seq} order by vacc_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_vaccination(cat_seq, medi_id, medi_name, vacc_type, vacc_date) values(#{cat_seq}, #{medi_id}, #{medi_name}, #{vacc_type}, now())
insert into t_medical(cat_seq, medi_id, medi_name, medi_content, medi_date) values(#{cat_seq}, #{medi_id}, #{medi_name}, #{medi_content}, now())

insert into t_catcard(cat_seq, cat_name, cat_birthdate, cat_gender, cat_neutral, mem_id, cat_spec, cat_date, cat_url, cat_sname) values(#{cat_seq}, #{cat_name}, #{cat_birthdate}, #{cat_gender}, #{cat_neutral}, #{mem_id}, #{cat_spec}, now(), #{cat_url}, #{cat_sname})
